comment:
* Represents a remote action that can be called from another process.  The action can have an
 * associated visualization including metadata like an icon or title.

methods.name: public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
methods.comment: * Sets whether this action is enabled.

methods.name: public boolean isEnabled()
methods.comment: * Return whether this action is enabled.

methods.name: public void setShouldShowIcon(boolean shouldShowIcon)
methods.comment: * Sets whether the icon should be shown.

methods.name: public boolean shouldShowIcon()
methods.comment: * Return whether the icon should be shown.

methods.name: public Icon getIcon()
methods.comment: * Return an icon representing the action.

methods.name: public CharSequence getTitle()
methods.comment: * Return an title representing the action.

methods.name: public CharSequence getContentDescription()
methods.comment: * Return a content description representing the action.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public void dump(String prefix, PrintWriter pw)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public void dump(String prefix, PrintWriter pw)
